main event: A witness observed a bright red light moving rapidly in the sky near Marietta, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was described as circular and approximately 40 to 50 feet in diameter., It emitted a reddish-orange glow., The object was traveling at an estimated speed of 1,000 miles per hour., The altitude of the object was estimated to be around 1,500 feet., The sighting lasted approximately 1.5 minutes.
sighted object: a bright red circular object emitting a reddish-orange glow
witness description: employees and individuals driving on US Route 20
